reviewText: Terrible waste of money. Was nothing like description.
Was not at all what I was hoping for

Hmm what to say. Well it was a transfer from VHS to DVD format so if you are only looking for quality looking visuals then this one is fair-good, but it is about 50mins long featuring two models who are pretty good looking. For Some it might be a bit tame but it is very good for straight Bondage, they are tightly bound and go through varying stages of undress as their featurette goes along. They end up in a panting heaving pile looking exhausted. although there is no real sex act per se, it is fairly arousing nonetheless. I enjoyed it even though I would consider this a kind of vanilla BD&SM. I add the SM for the fact that you have to be some what of an S to be able to watch and enjoy seeing a women/girl tied up and struggling in some fairly uncomfortable positions. so if you are new to the BD&SM scene then I would recommend  this one for you since it is tame enough for its contents. but Erotic enough to give you a glimpse and let you know if you would like to explore further.

So in conclusion I highly recommend this film hope this helps ya'll out ;D
There was no product in the sealed DVD case.
very poor quality. obviously recorded onto dvd from a vhs. very grainey and absolutely a waste of money. Do not recommend this dvd to anyone.
